title: Polkadot SDK PRDoc Schema
description: JSON Schema definition for the Polkadot SDK PR documentation

title.description: Title for the PR. This is what will show up in the documentation

authors.description: Optional: You may provide your name, github handle, or email. That can help finding your 'your' prdoc files later on

tags.description: Optional: You may provide some tags here. This is currently not used downstream but can help you find some prdoc files later on

doc.description:
Description of the PR. Provide a description for each relevant audience.
See the `audience` property for more documentation about audiences

crates.description:
You have the option to provide input about the semver level of your changes for each crate
. This is used during the crate publishing to crates.io and to help users understand the impact of the changes introduced in your PR.
You can also set it to `no change` if you know there was no significant semver change

migrations.description:
It is important for users to be aware of migrations.
Make sure to mention any migrations in the appropriate sub-properties

db.description: List of the Database Migrations or []

runtime.description: List of the Runtime Migrations or []

host_functions.description:
Lits of the host functions involved in this PR.
This is used to generate the host functions documentation.

oneOf.title: Those who build around the client side code. Alternative client builders, SMOLDOT, those who consume RPCs. These are people who are oblivious to the runtime changes. They only care about the meta-protocol, not the protocol itself.
All of those who rely on the runtime. A parachain team that is using a pallet. A DApp that is using a pallet. These are people who care about the protocol (WASM), not the meta-protocol (client).
Those who don't write any code and only run code.
Token holders who don't run anything but are involved in the network.

doc.description: You have the the option to provide different description of your PR for different audiences.

title.description: Optional title override for the PR and for the current audience

array_of_strings.description: An array of strings that can be empty

host_function.description: List of host functions and their descriptions
